detectors.description: XystusCoin.standard (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XystusCoin.sol#6) should be constant

receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) should be declared external:
	- tokenRecipient.receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XystusCoin.sol#2)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- XystusCoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XystusCoin.sol#32-39)

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) should be declared external:
	- XystusCoin.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XystusCoin.sol#49-56)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- XystusCoin.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XystusCoin.sol#59-69)

burn(uint256) should be declared external:
	- XystusCoin.burn(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XystusCoin.sol#71-77)

burnFrom(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- XystusCoin.burnFrom(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XystusCoin.sol#79-86)
